--mbx-list-text-color-light.description: List element text color when dark is `off`

--mbx-list-text-color-dark.description: List element text color when dark is `on`

--mbx-list-text-color-hover-light.description: List element text color when dark is `off`, on `hover`

--mbx-list-text-color-hover-dark.description: List element text color when dark is `on`, on `hover`
